overview: In 2014, the controversial performer Hija de Perra dies. Her family inherits a debt of 58 million pesos for health services. Transvestites, drag queens and others went to the streets to demonstrate.The documentary shows a pagan procession transformed into political action carrying the image of Hija de Perra through the streets as an emblem, revealing the bizarre and dirty face of transvestism, transformism and transsexuality, putting into practice a direct criticism of the state and private clinics .
title: 58 million kisses with AIDS
